articles.title: G7: UK and US have an 'indestructible relationship', PM says
articles.description: Boris Johnson coins a new term for the so-called "special relationship" as the G7 summit begins in Cornwall.
articles.content:
image captionBoris Johnson and Joe Biden met in Cornwall on Thursday ahead of the start of the G7 summit
The alliance between the US and the UK should be known as the "indestructible relationship", … [+5204 chars]

articles.author: Story by Reuters
articles.title: Statues of Queen Victoria, Queen Elizabeth toppled in Canada
articles.description: Protesters have toppled statues of Queen Victoria and Queen Elizabeth II in the Canadian city of Winnipeg as anger grows over the discovery of the remains of hundreds of children in unmarked graves at former indigenous schools.
articles.content: Winnipeg, CanadaProtesters have toppled statues of Queen Victoria and Queen Elizabeth II in the Canadian city of Winnipeg as anger grows over the discovery of the remains of hundreds of children in u… [+2362 chars]

articles.author: By Rashard Rose, CNN
articles.title: US extends Covid-19 travel restrictions with Canada and Mexico
articles.description: The United States has extended Covid-19 restrictions on non-essential travel at land and ferry crossings with Canada and Mexico until July 21, according to a tweet from the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) on Sunday.
articles.content: (CNN) The United States has extended Covid-19 restrictions on non-essential travel at land and ferry crossings with Canada and Mexico until July 21, according to a tweet from the Department of Homela… [+2295 chars]

articles.title: IKEA unveils LGBTQ-themed sofas -- and the internet has thoughts on its 'bisexual couch'
articles.description: IKEA Canada has unveiled a series of colorful couches inspired by different Pride flags, including those representing the transgender, nonbinary and asexual communities.

articles.title: Photos from historic G7 meetings
articles.description: The G7 is shorthand for Group of Seven, an organization of leaders from Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, the United Kingdom and the US. Look back at G7 summits through the years, and see how the group has evolved.
